backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines a feature evidence report specifying files and components related to adding Cristiano Ronaldo static images to the Cute Football mini‑game.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing component controlling game screen progression and loading states.
frontend/src/game/audio/SoundProvider.ts: Audio context provider managing sound toggle state and simple oscillator-based sound effects.
frontend/src/game/components/Achievement: Displays a temporary achievement toast with title, description, and trophy icon.
frontend/src/game/components/ChoiceMiniG: Reusable multiple-choice mini‑game with success/failure UI and sound effects.
frontend/src/game/components/LootChest.t: Interactive loot chest component revealing items and advancing on completion.
frontend/src/game/components/PixelHearts: Generates animated floating heart effects for celebratory moments.
frontend/src/game/components/RewardToast: Displays a temporary toast with an icon and message for 3 seconds when triggered.
frontend/src/game/components/SoundToggle: Button that toggles game sound on or off using SoundProvider.
frontend/src/game/components/UnlockSeque: Handles step-by-step unlock messages with optional final screen and sound effects.
frontend/src/game/flow.ts: Defines screen IDs and a mapping for determining the next game screen.
frontend/src/game/GameShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing background visuals, animated overlays, and the sound toggle around all screens.
frontend/src/game/screens/BootScreen.tsx: Simulates a boot/loading sequence before showing a start button.
frontend/src/game/screens/EndingAchievem: Shows the final achievement screen with rewards, animations, and a badge.
frontend/src/game/screens/FakeLoading.ts: Displays a fake loading screen with rotating messages and a progress bar.
Runs a multi-step sequence leading to a Valentine proposal with animated choices.
frontend/src/game/screens/index.ts: Exports all game screen components for unified access.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level1OriginSt: Presents an origin story using UnlockSequence with a final reward message.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level2MemoryAr: Shows a sequence of memories using UnlockSequence to advance.
Lists reasons the player is liked and triggers a reward toast before advancing.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level4SupportM: Uses UnlockSequence to show supportive moments with a final completion message.
frontend/src/game/screens/LobbyScreen.ts: Displays the game lobby with player info, mode, pending request, and a start button.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame1Defus: Renders a choice-based minigame where the player selects the correct action to defuse a bad day.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame2LootC: Shows a loot chest minigame that grants a single reward and advances on completion.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame3Penal: Provides a penalty kick–themed choice minigame where the correct answer wins the round.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGameCuteFo: Implements a timing-based football minigame requiring scoring goals by kicking within a power sweet spot.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGameHeartC: Implements a heart‑collecting minigame with falling items, a timer, scoring, and win/lose states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, and custom animations for the game's UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, typography and animation plugins, container settings, and extended fonts and radii.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a football game, including feature requests and required stylized images of Ronaldo and game elements.
